snippet.title: North Carolina storm outbreak may have included twisters
snippet.description:
* Severe weather brought damaging winds across much of eastern North Carolina, officials said Friday evening.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/25/us/severe-weather-in-plains/index.html

snippet.title: Helping Baltimore's grieving kids heal
snippet.description:
* At just 7 years old, Kyron Chase is facing the unimaginable: His father was murdered.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/us/cnnheroes-grier/index.html

snippet.title: SpaceX's Dragon on way to International Space Station
snippet.description:
* Belching smoke and fire, SpaceX's unmanned Dragon spacecraft successfully blasted off from Cape Canaveral, Florida, Friday afternoon on a resupply mission to the International Space Station.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/us/spacex-dragon-launch/index.html

snippet.title: The 23-year-old with 24 kids: Genocide orphans form their own families
snippet.description:
* It's a sunny April afternoon at the University of Rwanda College of Education in Kigali. Some students huddle in groups conversing in hushed voices; others hurry between buildings carrying books. Exams begin in a week.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/world/23-year-old-24-kids-rwanda/index.html

snippet.title: Best Easter egg hunts around the world
snippet.description:
* Searching living rooms and closets for your eggs may be fun the first six times, but if the novelty's wearing thinner than a chocolate egg's foil wrapping, there are more adventurous egg trails out there.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/travel/easter-egg-hunts/index.html

snippet.title: 'The Killing' final season gets Netflix release date
snippet.description:
* The final season ? the real final season this time ? of "The Killing" has a release date.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/showbiz/tv/the-killing-netflix-release-ew/index.html

snippet.title: A year later, Boston Marathon attack survivors are defiant and resilient
snippet.description:
* As Lee Ann Yanni got ready to run in this year's Boston Marathon, she made sure she had the silver stingray charm and necklace her father gave "his little girl" before he died of cancer. It is a talisman that back-to-back explosions at the 2013 marathon failed to rip from her body.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/21/us/boston-marathon-victims/index.html

snippet.title: Common Core promotes student success
snippet.description:
* As the drumbeat to roll back the Common Core State Standards gets louder, some people are starting to question the value and purpose of academic standards in the first place. Do states really need to set expectations for what all students should learn? Are state standardized tests necessary? Why not return to an age when Americans simply trusted th...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/25/opinion/porter-magee-common-core/index.html

snippet.title: Boy Scouts revoke Seattle church's charter over gay scoutmaster
snippet.description:
* The Boy Scouts of America has revoked the charter of a Seattle church that refused to fire its pack's gay scoutmaster, according to a letter written by the organization's general counsel and provided to CNN by the church.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/21/us/washington-boy-scouts-revoke-charter-gay-scoutmaster/index.html
